languages.text: "Мило. Сочини про это стишок, Волк, может полегчает".
"Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."
languages.original_text: "Мило. Сочини про это стишок, Волк, может полегчает".

traits.locale_text: "Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."
"Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."
"Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."
"Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."
"Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."
"Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."

languages.text: “真感人，不如你写首诗吧，乌尔法？说不定这样能让你感觉好点。”
languages.original_text: "Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."

traits.locale_text: “真感人，不如你写首诗吧，乌尔法？说不定这样能让你感觉好点。”

languages.text: 「感動するね。詩でも書けばいい、ウォルフ。少しでも気分が晴れるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."

traits.locale_text: 「感動するね。詩でも書けばいい、ウォルフ。少しでも気分が晴れるかもしれない」

languages.text: «Conmovedor. Escriba un poema sobre ello, Lobo. Tal vez le haga sentir mejor».
languages.original_text: "Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."

traits.locale_text: «Conmovedor. Escriba un poema sobre ello, Lobo. Tal vez le haga sentir mejor».

languages.text: "Rührend. Schreibt ein Gedicht darüber, Wolf. Vielleicht geht es Euch dann besser."
languages.original_text: "Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."

traits.locale_text: "Rührend. Schreibt ein Gedicht darüber, Wolf. Vielleicht geht es Euch dann besser."

languages.text: « Comme c'est touchant. Vous devriez en faire un poème, Space Wolf. Ça vous aidera peut-être à vous en remettre. »
languages.original_text: "Touching. Write a poem about it, Wolf. Perhaps it will make you feel better."

traits.locale_text: « Comme c'est touchant. Vous devriez en faire un poème, Space Wolf. Ça vous aidera peut-être à vous en remettre. »
